name: Web of Magic
description:
Web of Magic is a game where the main quest is going out to get herbs for your granny to heal a girl who was turned to stone. On this adventure, you meet a Siren, an Ogre and all the townspeople.

The Siren and Ogre though enemies when you first meet them, can be saved. 

Once you complete your mission, you may find that the game doesn't close, this is because there is a secret quest to save the townspeople. When you complete this mission, granny will congratulate you on saving everyone and the game will shut down.

There a few known bugs - the plants withering quest restarts, and the ogre glitches.
